title: Bug 13725: Revert is much slower than close and reopen in Java editor
description: Bug 13725: Revert is much slower than close and reopen in Java editor.
OB: When I answer "no" to the "do you want to save changes" dialog and then double click on the file in the navigator to reopen it, the contents of the window are replaced with the original immediately. However, if I repeat the steps, and then select "Revert" from the pop-up menu in the editor, it takes approximately 15 seconds to replace the contents of the window with the original.
SR:
1. Answer "no" to the "do you want to save changes" dialog.
2. Double click on the file in the navigator to reopen it.
3. Repeat steps 1 and 2.
4. Select "Revert" from the pop-up menu in the editor.
